meanings.definition: A person who operates or is skilled in the use of missiles.
meanings.sent1: The missileman aimed the missile at the target.
meanings.sent2: The missileman received special training to handle missiles.
meanings.sent3: The missileman accidentally pressed the wrong button, launching a water balloon instead of a missile.
meanings.sent4: She was a missileman in the debate, launching strong arguments one after another.
meanings.sent5: The missileman's precision in hitting the bullseye was unmatched.

meanings.definition: A member of a military unit specializing in the handling and launching of missiles.
meanings.sent1: The missileman's team prepared for the missile launch.
meanings.sent2: The missileman was part of the elite missile unit.
meanings.sent3: The missileman joked that their job was to send missiles to space on vacation.
meanings.sent4: He was a missileman on the battlefield, striking fear into the enemy with each missile launched.
meanings.sent5: The missileman's expertise ensured the missiles hit their targets accurately.
